sentences.english: In the simplest chemicing cell the electrolyte is the most efficient of sulfuric air conditioning unitidity in wdinedr.

sentences.english: Production costs and pollution can be reduced in iron-smelting by means of SAD in small blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 小高炉使用硫酸渣炼铁能降低生产成本，减少污染。

sentences.english: The content of sulfated group in polysaccharides functions importantly on their biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸基含量对多糖的生物活性起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: Sulfur or sulfuric deliveries can be similarly measured .

sentences.english: Large amount of water and zinc sulfate were used to have high yield of cyclohexene.
sentences.chinese: 要得到高的环己烯产率必须添加大量的水和硫酸锌。

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸钡制造醇酸腻子。

sentences.english: The effect of ultrasonic wave on calcium sulfate crystallization is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超声对硫酸钙结晶过程的影响。

sentences.english: In the experimental group, zinc sulfate was given intramuscularly each day, beginning 2 days before operation.
sentences.chinese: 供锌组于手术前2天起经肌肉供给硫酸锌。
工况也包括了发烟硫酸。

sentences.english: As the rover trundled around, its wheels kicked up soil rich in sulphate.

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo recognize the method of adulterating and preparation process of Pangolin adulterated with sulphate magnesium.

sentences.english: The perplexing problems of identifying the amount of SO42- in dyes are successfully solved.
sentences.chinese: 解决了分析染液中微量硫酸根离子的难题。

sentences.english: The fluid used in the study is bluestone solution.
sentences.chinese: 研究中采用的流体为硫酸铜溶液。

sentences.english: We determined urine iodine of 6105 pregnant women with cerous sulfate reducing reaction.

sentences.english: Activated clay is prepared via reation of bentonite and sulfuric acid at high temperature.
